participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and creative, loves to express herself through music and has a passion for arts.
participant_1.background: I work at a coffee house. I like to sing broadway show tunes. My favorite tv show is dancing with the stars. I am a student at michigan state university.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and fun-loving, enjoys making things and has a playful spirit.
participant_2.background: I play a lot of video games. I love cats. I decorate cakes for a living. I am slightly overweight, but my doctors say I'm healthy. I'm a lesbian.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I'm a cake decorator.
Oh, that's cool! Do you enjoy it?
Yeah, it's really fun. I love coming up with new designs and seeing my creations come to life.
That's great! What's your favorite kind of cake to make?
I love making wedding cakes. They're always so beautiful and intricate.
I can imagine! They must be really challenging to make.
They can be, but it's so rewarding when you finish one and it looks exactly how you wanted it to.
That's awesome! What's the most challenging cake you've ever made?
I once made a wedding cake that was shaped like a castle. It was really difficult to get all the details right, but it was worth it in the end.
That sounds amazing! I'm sure it was a beautiful cake.
It was! The bride and groom loved it.
That's great! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to play video games. I'm a big fan of the Zelda series.
Oh, I love Zelda too! What's your favorite game in the series?
My favorite is Ocarina of Time. It's such a classic.
I agree! It's one of my favorites too.
I also love cats. I have two of them.
Oh, that's awesome! I love cats too. I have one of my own.
What kind of cat do you have?
I have a tabby cat named Mittens.
Aww, I love tabby cats! They're so cute.
They are! I love her to death.
Me too! I love all cats
